attributes.additional_details: Free Kevin O'neill ... Kevin has all ready spent a grusome 28 years in prison and was released on life license 7 months ago sadly his marriage broke down and he now finds himself isolated again in a prison cell as he was licenced to hid wife's house and she put I'm out please help us to get him home with his family and friends x

rejection.details: You can submit another e-petition, stating what you want the government to do about this issue.
